name: Naked Gun Collection
overview: Naked Gun Collection is a series of hilarious, slapstick comedy films centered around the bumbling police detective, Frank Drebin, played by the iconic Leslie Nielsen. Filled with puns, visual gags, and absurd situations, these films poke fun at the conventions of the crime and detective genre, providing endless laughs and entertainment.

parts.original_title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
parts.overview: When the incompetent Lieutenant Frank Drebin seeks the ruthless killer of his partner, he stumbles upon an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
parts.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!

parts.original_title: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
parts.overview: Bumbling lieutenant Frank Drebin is out to foil the big boys in the energy industry, who intend to suppress technology that will put them out of business.
parts.title: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear

parts.overview: Frank Drebin is persuaded out of retirement to go undercover in a state prison. There he has to find out what top terrorist, Rocco, has planned for when he escapes. Adding to his problems, Frank's wife, Jane, is desperate for a baby.
parts.title: Naked Gun 33⅓: The Final Insult
